top.title: Ukraine's allies voice concerns over US plan to end war
top.summary: Leaders from Europe, Canada and Japan say the plan needs "additional work" but includes elements "essential for a just and lasting peace".

top.title: What we know about leaked US draft plan to end Russia's Ukraine war
top.summary: There are 28 key points and while several on the face of it could be acceptable to Ukraine, others cross Kyiv's red lines.

top.title: Trump ally Marjorie Taylor Greene to quit Congress after Epstein files feud
top.summary: A falling out with the US president erupted amid her relentless calls to release documents on the late paedophile.

top.title: Vinted blocks 'sickening' sexually explicit ads
top.summary: The online marketplace removed adverts which included a video a user said depicted a pornographic scene.

top.title: Teens plead not guilty over TfL cyber-attack
top.summary: Thalha Jubair, 19, and Owen Flowers, 18,  are charged with conspiring to commit unauthorised acts.

top.title: Graduate jobs under threat from AI, PwC boss says
top.summary: The accountancy giant says artificial intelligence will eventually lead to fewer entry-level positions at the firm.
